resources.string: It\'s a time for intense workout
This is the first version of the application. This application can be used during intense workout to set timers for each workout set and for the rest time.
1. Set timer for each workout set and rest time.
2. Voice feature for workout time, approaching rest time, and rest time.
3. Timer color change for workout time, approaching rest time, and rest time.
4. Provides alert 5 seconds before rest time.
1. Set different time for each workout set.
2. Set time in minutes and seconds.
Thank you for using this application. We always appreciate feedbacks. This is one of the best way to make product better.
